meanings.sent1: Primatology involves observing and researching different types of monkeys and apes.
meanings.sent2: Jane Goodall is a renowned expert in primatology, focusing on chimpanzees.
meanings.sent3: The primatology class had a fun field trip to the zoo to watch the monkeys swing from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: In the world of primatology, each primate species is like a unique puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on primatology showcased the fascinating social structures of gorilla families.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of primates and their behavior.
meanings.sent1: Researchers in primatology use advanced technology to track the movements of primates in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The field of primatology has led to significant discoveries about primate communication.
meanings.sent3: The primatology conference had a hilarious skit about a day in the life of a mischievous monkey.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the depths of primatology is like unraveling the secrets of our closest animal relatives.
meanings.sent5: The book on primatology painted a vivid picture of the intricate social dynamics among different primate species.
